Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: no loaded talkpad' on quit

If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001330

If camera_x > Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001660

If camera_y > Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001800

If true is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004038

If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005048
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
If actor_x >= camera_x + XRes ELSE GOTO 00005196
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres ELSE GOTO 00005262
If panel is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005550
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005550
If panel_bottom is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005592
If panel_top is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005654
If control1_buttons|control2_buttons|control3fire|control4fire is not zero ELSE GOTO 00006114

If actor_x >= camera_x + xres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006532

If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00007260
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00007540
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00007932

If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00008458
Yield on actor timer to  next line
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00009490

Yield on  timer to  next line

Yield on  timer to  next line
Print 'You didn't catch all the spirits!' to bottom panel

Yield on  timer to  next line
Yield on  timer to  next line
